title: After ‘Top Chef,’ Padma Lakshmi Wants to Show How People Really Eat
summary: Padma Lakshmi’s new book, Padma’s All American, is a record of the years she spent traveling for Taste the Nation | Cover courtesy Knopf | Collage by Masood Shah For her show Taste the Nation, Padma Lakshmi traveled across the country to cook, eat, and immerse herself in different immigrant communi…

title: BTS’ Jimin and Jung Kook Returning For Season 2 of Disney+ Travel Series ‘Are You Sure?!’
summary: The upcoming run was filmed after the duo completed their mandatory South Korean military service.
body: BTS ‘ Jimin and Jung Kook are hitting the road again next month. No, the K-pop group has not (yet) announced the dates for what fans are hoping will be their 2026 comeback tour. But the bandmates will be packing their bags for the upcoming second season of their hit reality travel series Are You Sure?! , which will premiere exclusively on Disney+ on Dec. 3. Related Everything the Members of BTS Have Said About Their Upcoming Reunion RM Reveals When BTS’ Long-Awaited Comeback Is Happening: ‘We Have to Keep Preparing’ 'Folded' Becomes Kehlani's First No. 1 on Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs Chart According to a release, the second go-round of the show was filmed after the duo completed their mandatory South Korean military service and it “captures Jimin and BTS lead vocalist Jung Kook embarking on an unforgettable 12-day journey that spans from the majestic mountains of Switzerland to the vibrant shores of Vietnam. Traveling light with only their luggage, a modest budget, and a trusty guidebook, the pair dive into a mix of thrilling adventures, serene getaways, and spontaneous, fun-filled moments.” The show will cover their 12-day ad…
